Package com.example.Bank.Utilaties

Class RSAKeyProperties

java.lang.Object
com.example.Bank.Utilaties.RSAKeyProperties
@Component public class RSAKeyProperties extends Object
Component class for managing RSA key properties. This class provides properties for managing RSA public and private keys. It generates a new key pair upon instantiation.
Author:
Pedro Pereira

    • RSAKeyProperties

      public RSAKeyProperties()
